message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good deal.
Alice, let's split things a bit more evenly.  My offer benefits us both in the long run.
Bob, this is a better deal for me than your last offer. I'm willing to be reasonable, but time is ticking.
Alice, this is a fair offer considering the time pressure and the decreasing value. Let's close the deal and both benefit.
Bob, we're running out of time. This offer is a compromise, take it before inflation eats into the value even more.
Alice, this is my final offer. A perfectly even split is the fairest option. Let's end this before we both lose out.
